documentation.description: Shows information about currently configured aliases to indices including filter and routing infos.

name.description: A comma-separated list of alias names to return

format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

h.description: Comma-separated list of column names to display

s.description: Comma-separated list of column names or column aliases to sort by

expand_wildcards.description: Whether to expand wildcard expression to concrete indices that are open, closed or both.

master_timeout.description: Timeout for waiting for new cluster state in case it is blocked
